turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm trying to order a Americano at Peet's Coffee in the Hillcrest location in San Diego, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what size would you like your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, but I didn't see any options for it. If they have almond milk, I'd like almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, anything else you would like to add?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you confirm the pickup location once again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure. It's the Hillcrest on 350 University Avenue in San Diego, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have a small americano with almond milk, is this correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: all set, your coffee will be ready for pickup at peet's coffee in hillcrest san diego in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text. enjoy!
